content:

data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split('\n')
n = int(data[0])
arr = list(map(int, data[1].split()))
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/solution.py
+++ /workspace/solution.py
@@ -5 +5,3 @@

+    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split('\n')

+arr = list(map(int, data[1].split()))
